title: Siw Malmkvist - Midnattssolen.mp3
description:
Track # 2 from Metronome MEP490, a 45 rpm vinyl EP released in 1959. Swedish vocalist Siw Malmkvist sings "Midnattssolen" (The Mignight Sun Never Sets). This track can&#039;t be found on any of the CD releaes. This was picked up from a decent record. Audio was restored as best possible using Adobe Audition, for picking up the audio I used an Ortofon MC20 moving coil pickup connected to a Ortofon MCA-76 moving coil preamplifier. These are great stuff for capturing the true dynamic sound of the old vinyl records.
This is my first uploaded torrent file ever so I cannot guarantee it will work.

Enjoy this track, tributing one of Sweden&#039;s finest vocalists ever.
